S04bsu010_u:2_0_0: 1. evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma kalantakanivāse veṇuvane mahatā bhikṣusaṅaghena sārdhaṃ
S04bsu010_u:2_1: atha bhagavānanekaśatasahasraparivāraparivṛtaḥ purato 'valokya dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu010_u:2_2: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇamavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyajanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ prakāśayati sma /
S04bsu010_u:3_0: 2. tadā magadharājaḥ śreṇyo vimvisāraḥ mahātā rājavibhavena mahatā ca rājabalena rājagṛhānmahānagarānniṣkramya yena veṇuvanaṃ yena ca bhagavān tenopasaṅakramīt /
S04bsu010_u:3_1: upasaṅakramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte atiṣṭhat /
S04bsu010_u:3_2: ekānte sthitvā magadharājaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhagavantametadavocat /
S04bsu010_u:3_3: kathaṃ bhagavan kṛtaṃ karma saṃcayaṃ pratirudhya ciraniruddhaṃ maraṇakāla upasthitaṃ manaso 'bhimukhībhavati /
S04bsu010_u:4_1: tadyathā mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapne janapadakalyāṇyā striyā sārdhaṃ paricaret /
S04bsu010_u:4_3: tatkiṃ manyase mahārāja svapne sā janapadakalyāṇī strī /
S04bsu010_u:6_0: 5. bhagavānāha!tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja api nu sa puruṣaḥ kiṃ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet /
S04bsu010_u:7_1: atyantatayā tu bhagavan svapne janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu010_u:8_0: 7. bhagavānāha!evameva mahārāja balo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi ddaṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni rūpāṇyabhiniviśet /
S04bsu010_u:8_1: abhiniviṣṭa anurajyate / anuraktaḥ saṃrajyate / saṃrakto rāgajaṃ dveṣajaṃ mohajaṃ karma kāyavāṅmanobhirabhisaṃskaroti /
S04bsu010_u:8_3: niruddhaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu010_u:8_4: na dakṣiṇām / na paścimām / nottarām / nordhvam / nādhaḥ / na vidiśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu010_u:8_5: tat karma kadācinmaraṇa kālasamaya upasthite tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayāt caramavijñāne niruddhe manaso 'bhimukhībhavati /
S04bsu010_u:9_0: tasya ca mahārāja prathamavijñānasya samanantaraniraddhasya tatsabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate /
S04bsu010_u:9_2: tatra mahārāja na kaściddharmaḥ asmāt lokātparalokaṃ saṅkrāmati /
S04bsu010_u:9_5: sā cyutiriti saṃjñā / yaḥ prathamavijñānasya prādurbhāvaḥ /
S04bsu010_u:9_6: sopapattiriti / caramavijñānaṃ mahārāja nirodhe 'pi na svacidgacchati /
S04bsu010_u:9_8: svabhāvarahitatvāt / tatra mahārāja caramavijñānaṃ caramavijñānena śūnyam /
S04bsu010_u:9_9: cyutiścayutyā śūnyā / karma karmaṇā śūnyam / prathamavijñānaṃ prathamavijñānena śūnyam /
S04bsu010_u:9_11: prathamavijñānasya mahārāja aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya nirantarā cittasantatiḥ pravartate /
S04bsu010_u:9_13: evaṃ bhagavānāha / sugata evamuktvā anyadevamavocat śāstā /
S04bsu010_u:11_0: 9. yena yena hi nāmnā vai yo yo dharmo 'bhilapyate /
S04bsu010_u:11_1: nāsau saṃvidyate tatra dharmāṇāṃ sā hi dharmatā //
S04bsu010_u:12_0: 10. nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmnā nāma na vidyate /
S04bsu010_u:13_1: sāpyatra kalpanā śūnyā yayā śūnyā vikalpitāḥ //
S04bsu010_u:16_0: 14. na cakṣūḥ prekṣate rūpaṃ mano dharmānna vetti ca /
S04bsu010_u:16_1: etattu paramaṃ satyaṃ yatra loko na gāhate //
S04bsu010_u:17_0: 15. evamavocadbhagavān / magadhadeśarājaḥ śreṇyaḥ bimbisāraḥ te bodhisattvāste ca bhikṣavaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko muditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan /
